question: What is the main objective of the launching of ‘MadhuApp’ by Odisha?
option2: To provide online selling and purchase facility of Honey
option3: To provide video tutorial lessons to school children
answer: To provide video tutorial lessons to school children
explanation: ‘MadhuApp’ is a smart learning mobile app which helps school students (Class V to VIII) to learn their lesson through video lectures. It was named after Madhusudan Das (Utkal Gourab).
